content: WASHINGTON Danaher Corp co-founder Mitchell Rales agreed to pay $720 000 to settle allegations that he failed to report stock purchases to the government so that they could be vetted to determine if they violate antitrust law  antitrust enforcers said on Tuesday.
name: Danaher Corporation
title: Two settle U.S. charges on failing to file stock buys with regulator

content: WASHINGTON  Jan 17 Danaher Corp  co-founder Mitchell Rales agreed to pay $720 000 to settle allegations that he failed to report stock purchases to the government so that they could be vetted to determine if they violate antitrust law  antitrust enforcers said on Tuesday.
name: Danaher Corporation
title: Two settle U.S. charges on failing to file stock buys with regulator

content: Danaher Corp said on Tuesday it would buy medical diagnostics company Cepheid in a deal valued at $4 billion  including debt  that will strengthen its presence in  molecular diagnostics.
name: Danaher Corporation
title: Danaher to buy Cepheid in $4 billion deal to expand in diagnostics

content: May 11 Water and air filter maker Pall Corp  is in the final stages of an auction that could value the company at more than $10 billion  the Wall Street Journal reported on Monday.
name: Danaher Corporation
title: Pall Corp in final stages for sale of filter maker -WSJ

content: May 13 The following bids  mergers  acquisitions and disposals were reported by 2000 GMT on Wednesday:
name: Danaher Corporation
title: Deals of the day- Mergers and acquisitions

content: Danaher Corp  will buy air and water-filter maker Pall Corp  in a $13.8 billion deal to tap into fast-growing demand from the biotechnology industry  and said it would split into two listed companies after the deal.
name: Danaher Corporation
title: Danaher to buy Pall Corp in $13.8 billion deal  split into two

content: * Danaher shares up 4.7 pct  Pall Corp up 5 pct   (Adds details from conference call  analysts comments  updates shares)
name: Danaher Corporation
title: UPDATE 3-Danaher to buy Pall Corp in $13.8 bln deal  split into two

content: May 13 Danaher Corp said it would buy Pall Corp  a maker of water and air filters  for about $13.8 billion  including debt.
name: Danaher Corporation
title: Danaher to buy Pall Corp for $13.8 bln
